Comment.val: General remark ============ If the oder by / sort of BTPC rows has to be changed in BXA052, also the order by / sort of BTPC rows in BXA003 has to be changed. Both programs always have to use the same order by!!!

Text.val: -- Author: Andreas Brandt, 25.10.2001
@Before changing the sort/order by of BTPC, read comments (F10)@
07.10.2014 GB SCR19187 1. File for the client: changed where clause
05.10.2014 GB SCR19187 Changed set value for REPA_SEQUENCENUMBER
01.10.2014 GB SCR19187 BXA052/8: Starting balance (:60F:): Changed range of selection ACCC
04.07.2013 SH SCR18258 BXA052/8 Changed ACCC selection, ACCT_DATPRINTED = PI.DATCASHREPORT instead
ACCC_ACCT_DATE = PI.DATCASHREPORT
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
26.07.2012 GB SCR17464 Replaced UFB525 MagicConcat by GB730 AppendFile to build the final XML
12.10.2011 SH SCR16798 BXA052/7 Reduced length of invoice number for output to 10
26.07.2011 SH SCR16635 BXA051/2/4/6/Extended BPIV_INVO_INVOICENO to alpha 20
11.07.2011 SH SCR16594 BXA052/8 Added CLBD310_BANKACCOUNT to write to :25:
13.04.2011 GB SCR16261 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
07.09.2010 SH SCR15790 BXA052/8 Changed module to write MT940 start rows
always and not only if BTPC rows exists
26.08.2008 SH SCR13904 BXA052/8 Changed output segment :60F: (credit/debit flag)
02.06.2008 SH SCR13652 BXA052/8 Added output of account changes
08.05.2008 SH SCR13599 BXA052/8 Changed logic of payment selections form BTPC
into BPIV selections
18.02.2008 SH SCR13398 Added BXA052/8, is called now for PI.RPRT_TYPE = MT9
(disabled BXA052/2 --> German version of MT9, did not removed, perhaps we need
it later again)
04.02.2008 SH SCR10693 BXA052/7 Changed oder by logic acc. to GNRL_CODE
15.10.2007 SH SCR12764 BXA052/4 Added <name_debtor> and <city_debtor>
09.07.2006 SH SCR12685 Set PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME = blank if GNRL_CODE = "PL"
27.07.2006 SH SCR10693 Added dynamically order by for BXA052/7 and added
BTPC_DEBC_DEBC_SORT to order by in BXA052/1 /2 /3 /4 /5 /6 and removed
BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP from order by in all BXA052 submodules

if PI.LAWY_LAWYER = 0
03.05.2006 SH SCR11092 BXA052/7 Changed sort of BTPC to the same as in BXA003
28.04.2006 SH SCR10806 BXA052/4 If GSET_YESNO (21) = Y then
BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENT is used for <value_date> now
12.04.2006 AS SCR#10927 fixed open modes for table CLNT
21.12.2005 SH SCR9855 BXA052/7 Changed usage of 65 to 58 for BPIV_PAYMENTCODE
19.12.2005 SH SCR9855 BXA052/7 Changed writing of v.VARIABLETEXT for
BTPC_DEBH_HADR_NAME1 and DEBH_CITY
24.11.2005 SH SCR8487 BXA052/7 changed signs for fields 14 and 23
15.11.2005 SH SCR8487 BXA052/7 Added total row; changed writing of
<payment_code_text>; removed spec. handling according to PI.LAWYER > 0 and ....
26.10.2005 SH SCR9369 Extended PI.ATTACHMENT for BXA900 for report type = "OJF"
23.08.2005 SH SCR8487 BXA052/7 mult. changes done, see SCR for more details
04.08.2005 SH SCR8487 Added new module BXA052/7
01.07.2005 SH SCR8478 Removed XML reserved characters for DEBC_DEBC where
HTML merge is used
30.03.2005 SH SCR8034 Changed <date> from BTPC_DATCASHREPORT to
26.01.2005 SH SCR7702 Extended test to switch the reporttype = "ZAP" with
PI.CLNTNO = 0 (only for country "PL" and if PI.REPORTTYPE = "ZAD")
11.05.2004 SH SCR6182 BXA052/2 Skip the writing of the last remaining
description part if there is only a . (full stop)
31.03.2004 SH SCR5844 Added LAWY_EMAIL to PI.FILEMAILADDRESS (BXA900)
if PI.LAWYER < 0
25.03.2004 SH SCR5795 BXA052/6 Added <administration>, <client> to report
- where BPIV rows will be written to report.
23.03.2004 SH SCR5775 Added argument for PI.ATTACHMENTNAME (BXA900)
if PI.LAWYER = 0

- PI.REPORTTYPE, before if PI.REPORTTYPE = 'DPI', 'GAC' was used
04.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
01.03.2004 SH SCR5612 BXA052/2 Removed +/- sign from amount fields
12.02.2004 SH SCR5518 BXA052/6 added new tags <administration_nr>, <client_nr>
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
04.02.2004 SH SCR5444 Restructured BXA052 to handled all BTPC rows if
- PI.LAWYER > 0, see SCR for details
29.01.2004 SH SCR5408 BXA052/6 Reduced selection of BPIV rows with markcodespec
- and markcodetext
28.01.2004 SH SCR5154 Added new fields where REPA will be stored
06.01.2004 SH SCR5171 Added new part "HELLER FORMAT PL", will be used if
- PI.REPORTTYPE='ZAD' and GNRL_CODE='PL'; if GNRL_CODE='PL' PI.REPORTTYPE
- has to be updated with 'ZAP', if 'ZAD'

17.12.2003 SH SSCR5084 Changed sequence (=Order by) for fetching BTPC, relevant
- for all formats

09.12.2003 SH SCR5009 Changed PI.FILE for BXA900 to 'A' if 2.File for the lawyer
27.11.2003 SH SCR4889 Changed some details for format DPI, see SCR for details
14.10.2003 SH Changed DPI format to GAC stylesheet format
13.10.2003 SH SCR4539 Mult BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV * -1 for <deduction_amount_cc>
10.10.2003 SH SCR3942 MT9 FORMAT --> Restructured the writing of
- descriptions ":86:"; now all descriptions will be written in a line of 65
- digits, if there are more description the remaining parts will be written
- to a new line with a lenght of 65 digits

24.09.2003 RR SCR4415 Added cash-report in Heller format
04.07.2003 RR SCR3944 Added Handler to ignore record-locking
03.07.2003 JJ req JDO Heller format BPIV amounts <0 with - in front of number
16.06.2003 SH SCR3764 MT9 --> Added new tag <row>CLNT110_NAME1</row>
15.04.2003 SCR3337 MT9 FORMAT amounts will be printed now without
- thousand seperator

"HELLER FORMAT,BPIV ROWS"

05.09.2002 SH Write now for every DTA line one CDATA section

( look in BXA003 )

- and if PI.LAWY_LAWYER <> 0 : REPA_RECIPIENT = 4

08.04.2002 SH SCR1059 replaced hardcoded pathnames for the location of the
- templates, used now the pathname from the virtual 'v_dir_template'

07.03.2002 SH SCR952 Set Allow Event to 'N', all tasks

-- 'ZAP' for country 'PL'
-- uses for errorhandling

could be used again in the future

could be used again in the future

-- Validation of templates for reporttype = 'OJF'
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
New Report_Archive Row
Header + end
... prepare PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME for BXA900
-- For reporttype = 'MT9'

could be used again in the future

could be used again in the future

Build WhereClause for XML file for ...
... Client
... Laywer
Build OrderBy for BTPC selections (only use in BXA052/7 and BXA052/8)
tasks are called according to pi.rprt_type
-- 15.02.2008 SCR13398 SH Blocked since new module BXA052/8 is active, perhaps
could be used again in the future

ExpSyntax.val: 'BTPC_ADMNO='&Trim (Str ({1,1},'9'))&' and BTPC_CLNTNO='&Trim (Str ({1,2},'10'))&' and BTPC_DATCASHREPORT between '&ASCIIChr(39)&DStr ({1,23},'YYYY-MM-DD')&ASCIIChr(39)&' and '&ASCIIChr(39)&DStr ({1,24},'YYYY-MM-DD')&ASCIIChr(39)&IF ({1,5}=0,'',' and BTPC_BTCH_ID='&Trim (Str ({1,5},'#9')))&' and BTPC_SEQUENCENUMBER > 0'
'TX52_RPRT_TYPE = '''&{1,4}&''' and TX52_LAWY_LAWYER = '&Trim (Str ({1,8},'9'))&' and BTPC_BTCH_ID = TX52_BTCH_ID and BTPC_BTCP_LINENO = TX52_BTCP_LINENO and BTPC_LINENO = TX52_BTPC_LINENO'
'BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC_CLNTNO, BTPC_BATCHIDSRTBXA003, BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC_SORT, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC, BTPC_DEBH, BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC_LINENO'

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BTPC_ADMNO,BTPC_CLNTNO,BTPC_DATCASHREPORT, BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC, BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC_LINENO, BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC, BTPC_AMOUNTCURRPAY,BTPC_DEBH, BTPC_DEBH_HADR_NAME1, BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT,BTPC_JOURNALNO, BTPC_MUTAFACTORING, BTPC_MUTASPECIAL, BTPC_MUTARETENTION, BTPC_MUTADISPUTES, BTPC_MUTASETTLEMENT, BTPC_SEQUENCENUMBER , BTPC_DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY FROM :1/BTPC :3 where :2 Order by BTPC_ADMNO,BTPC_CLNTNO,BTPC_BATCHIDSRTBXA003,BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC_SORT, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC, BTPC_DEBH, BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC_LINENO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: //12-03-2003 JP SCR #3147 extend selection list
-- Uses in parent task to prepare PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (uses for BXA900)
//12-03-2003 JP SCR #3147 fetch code description

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BTPC_BTCH_ID,BTPC_BTCP_LINENO,BTPC_LINENO, BTPC_SEQUENCENUMBER,BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT,BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC, BTPC_AMOUNTCURRPAY ,BTPC_DEBH,BTPC_DEBC_DEBC ,BTPC_DEBH_HADR_NAME1,BTPC_ADMNO,BTPC_CLNTNO, BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP FROM :2/BTPC :3 WHERE :1 Order by BTPC_ADMNO,BTPC_CLNTNO,BTPC_BATCHIDSRTBXA003, BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC_SORT, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC, BTPC_DEBH, BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC_LINENO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: for writing the header only one time
only written one time (header)
-- Uses in parent task to prepare PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (uses for BXA900)
-- String which contains the diff. descriptions, if the lenght of v.PRODUCED_
-- STRING will be >= than 65 the first 65 digits will be written to
-- v.STRING_TO_XML and will be deleted from v.PRODUCED_STRING
-- String which will be written to XML
-- The diff. descriptions will be separated by a "Feldschlüssel". The first part
-- included an '?' and the following part is a kind of sequenece number, given
-- by the germans banks.
-- So if the prefix has to be changed only the INIT has to be modified
-- Init with start-tag
-- Write remaining part of descriptions to XML; if only a . (full stop) has to
be written to XML then skip the writing, because a . (full stop) causes
problems with sending the file via email (the part below . (full stop) will
skipped by sevaral email programs
-- Feldschlüssel 00
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- Feldschlüssel 20
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- Feldschlüssel 21
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- Feldschlüssel 22
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- Build string form BPIV row which has to be written to XML
-- 1. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
-- 2. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
--3. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
--4. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
-- INFO: Before the BPIV text with sequencenumber = 60 will be written,
-- we have to write a line with "Feldschlüssel ?34" to
-- indicate that addtional lines "Feldschlüssel ?60 - ?63" will be written to
-- XML (Only relevant in the part below)
--5. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
--6. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
--7. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
--8. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
--9. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
--10. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
--11. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
--12. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
--13. BPIV row --> Connect the sevaral BPIV informations into one string
-- Write BPIV_VARIABLETEXT if exists
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- The special calculation of the sequencenumber is mandatory regarding
-- to the format of the XML file (bank format)
-- first 7 numbers (?23 - ?29)
-- following two numbers (?32 - ?33)
-- last 4 numbers (?60 - ?63)

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC,BTPC_DEBH_HADR_NAME1,BTPC_DEBH,BTPC_DEBC_DEBC,BTPC_AMOUNTCURRPAY,BTPC_JOURNALNO,BTPC_SEQUENCENUMBER,BTPC_BTCH_ID,BTPC_BTCP_LINENO,BTPC_LINENO,BTPC_ADMNO,BTPC_CLNTNO, BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP FROM :1/BTPC :3 WHERE :2 Order by BTPC_ADMNO,BTPC_CLNTNO,BTPC_BATCHIDSRTBXA003, BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC_SORT, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC, BTPC_DEBH, BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC_LINENO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: RECORD C PART 1
RECORD C PART 2
RECORD C PART 3
RECORD E
-- Virtuals to calculate totals for record E
-- Build record E
-- mult with 100, no decimal point will be printed to XML
-- Build record A
-- Build record C
-- Calculate totals for record E
-- Reset virtuals
-- Uses in parent task to prepare PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (uses for BXA900)
-- Print XML lines if there were not printed in the R.S.
- Build strings for part C3-C6
-- Write part C3 to XML
-- Write part C4 to XML
-- Write part C5 to XML
-- Write part C6 to XML
-- Reset virtuals for the next part of a C record

ExpSyntax.val: Counter (0)=1 OR Counter (0)=5 OR Counter (0)=9 OR Counter (0)=13

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :4/bpiv where BPIV_BTCH_ID=:1 AND BPIV_BTCP_LINENO=:2 AND BPIV_BTPC_LINENO=:3 and bpiv_amountcurrc<>0

Text.val: -- If QCOUNT > 13 set v.Count = 13, the maximum number of descriptions reached

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT * FROM :1/BTPC :3 WHERE :2 ORDER BY BTPC_ADMNO,BTPC_CLNTNO,BTPC_BATCHIDSRTBXA003,BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC_SORT, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC, BTPC_DEBH, BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC_LINENO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

-- Work-Fields
-- Init Work-Fields
-- Init Work-Fields
-- Only write debtor details if GNRL_CODE <> 'PL'
-- Handle BPIV-Rows
-- Uses in parent task to prepare PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (uses for BXA900)
-- Get BPIV-Data
-- Virtual Work-Fields
-- Init Work-Field
-- Get Code-Description
-- Output XML-Format

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT * FROM :1/BTPC :3 WHERE :2 ORDER BY BTPC_ADMNO,BTPC_CLNTNO,BTPC_BATCHIDSRTBXA003,BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC_SORT, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC, BTPC_DEBH, BTPC_BTCH_ID,BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC_LINENO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

-- Get DEBH-Data
-- Handle BPIV-Rows

-- Virtual Work-Fields
-- Init Work-Field

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BTPC_ADMNO,BTPC_CLNTNO,BTPC_DATCASHREPORT, BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC, BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC_LINENO, BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC, BTPC_AMOUNTCURRPAY,BTPC_DEBH, BTPC_DEBH_HADR_NAME1, BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT,BTPC_JOURNALNO, BTPC_MUTAFACTORING, BTPC_MUTASPECIAL, BTPC_MUTARETENTION, BTPC_MUTADISPUTES, BTPC_MUTASETTLEMENT, BTPC_SEQUENCENUMBER , BTPC_DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY FROM :1/BTPC :3 where :2 Order by BTPC_ADMNO,BTPC_CLNTNO,BTPC_BATCHIDSRTBXA003,BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC_SORT, BTPC_DEBC_DEBC, BTPC_DEBH, BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC_LINENO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: //12-03-2003 JP SCR #3147 extend selection list
- Build SQL_WHERECLAUSE to obtain BPIV
-- Uses in parent task to prepare PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (uses for BXA900)

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT * FROM :1/BTPC WHERE :2 ORDER BY :3 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- SQL-Output-Fields (There are more BTPC fields selected as used in this module
because it's a copy of BXA052/4. I did not removed this fields, could be used
maybe in the future) --> SH 13.07.2005 SCR 8478
-- Work-Fields
-- Uses to write total line to XML
-- Finally write total row
-- Uses to trigger writing of some amounts only if BTPC row changes
-- Handle BPIV-Rows
-- Uses in parent task to prepare PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (uses for BXA900)
-- Calculate totals
-- Get BPIV-Data
-- Virtual Work-Fields
-- unique sequence number for all rows which are written to XML
-- Recalc BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC from client to invoice currency
-- Invoice number for output only 10 characters
-- Prepare variable text
-- Output XML-Format
-- Reset trigger, becomes TRUE again if BTPC_LINENO changes
-- Calculate totals
-- Output XML-Format

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BTPC_BTCH_ID,BTPC_BTCP_LINENO,BTPC_LINENO, BTPC_SEQUENCENUMBER,BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT,BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC, BTPC_AMOUNTCURRPAY ,BTPC_DEBH,BTPC_DEBC_DEBC ,BTPC_DEBH_HADR_NAME1,BTPC_ADMNO,BTPC_CLNTNO, BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP FROM :2/BTPC :3 WHERE :1 Order by :4 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- Set constants for report
@BXA052/8 does not support ASCII fles for lawyers with multiple clients, so
client values are fetched only once
1. Start of file
-- Reference :20:
-- Account :25:
-- Sequence number :28C:
-- Starting balance :60F:
-- Used in parent task to prepare PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (used for BXA900)
-- 2a. For every account change
3. End of the file
-- End balance :62F:
-- Total amount and lines :86:
-- Name of client :86:
-- Closing row :86:
2. For every invoice payment
-- Payment :61:
-- 1. Description :86:
-- 2. Description :86:
-- 3. Description :86:
-- 4. Description :86
-- 5. Description :86
-- Calc totals for "3. End of the file"
-- Payment :61:
-- 1. Description :86:
-- 2. until 6. Description :86:
-- Calc totals for "3. End of the file"
-- 2. Description :86:
-- 3. Description :86:
-- 4. Description :86
-- 5. Description :86
-- 6. Description :86
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- 18.02.2008 SCR13398 SH Blocked since new module BXA052/8 is active, perhaps
could be used again in the future
... for reporttype = 'MT9' (BXA052/8 --> ING MT9 format)
-- Build final filename for the XML File
